#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <string.h>
using namespace std;

long long arr[110][110];
bool graph[110][110];
int matchR[110],matchL[110];
bool seen[100];
int n,m;
bool bpm(int u)
{
    for(int i=0;i<m;++i)
    {
        if(graph[u][i] && !seen[i])
        {
            seen[i]=true;
            //cout<<"seen: "<<u<<i<<endl;
            if(matchR[i]<0 || bpm(matchR[i]))
            {
                matchR[i]=u;
                matchL[u]=i;
                //cout<<"found "<<i<<u<<endl;
                return true;
            }
        }
    }
    return false;
}
int main()
{
    int k;
    scanf("%d %d %d",&n,&m,&k);
    for(int i=0;i<n;++i)
        for(int j=0;j<m;++j)
            scanf("%lld",&arr[i][j]);

    long long l=1,r=1e12,mid;
    while(l<r)
    {
        memset(matchR,-1,sizeof(matchR));
        memset(matchL,-1,sizeof(matchL));
        memset(graph,0,sizeof(graph));

        mid=(l+r)/2;
        for(int i=0;i<n;++i)
            for(int j=0;j<m;++j)
                if(arr[i][j]<=mid) graph[i][j]=1;

        int ans=0;
        for(int i=0;i<n;++i)
        {
            memset(seen,0,sizeof(seen));
            if(bpm(i)) ans++;
        }
        if(ans>=k)
            r=mid;
        else l=mid+1;
    }
    printf("%lld\n",r);
}
